testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I would like to be able to view and update the fees so that I can keep the school fees up to date.
testcase.name: On the "feemaster" page, there should be an "Add Fees Master" section with the following fields: Fees Group, Fees Type, Due Date, Amount Percentage (%), Fix Amount, and Fine Type (radio buttons). Additionally, there should be a "Fees Master List" - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When User sees and clicks the Admin Login Button............................passed Then User enters the "kubra.tankisi@admin.wonderworldcollege.com" and "wonderworld123" and clicks the Login Button..passed Then Fees Master page link should be displayed under the Fees Collection menu title.passed Then Fees Master page link should be clicked and redirected to the feemaster page..passed Then Add Fees Master should be displayed....................................undefined Then Fees Group is displayed on the Add Fees Master page....................skipped Then Fees Type is displayed on the Add Fees Master page.....................skipped Then Due Date is displayed on the Add Fees Master page......................skipped Then Amount Percantage(%), is displayed on the Add Fees Master page.........skipped Then Fix Amount textBoxes and Fine Type radio buttons and Fees Master List, Fees Group are displayed With.skipped Then Fix Amount textBoxes and Fine Type radio buttons and Fees Master List, Fees Code are displayed.skipped Then Fix Amount textBoxes and Fine Type radio buttons and Fees Master List, Amount and Action titles are displayed.skipped And User closes the page....................................................skipped
